verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
How <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> will it be ere ye <S%H7760>make<s%> an <S%H7078>end<s%> of <S%H4405>words?<s%> <S%H995>mark,<s%> and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> we will <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4069><s%> are we <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and reputed <S%H2933>vile<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight?<s%>

He <S%H2963>teareth<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> in his <S%H639>anger:<s%> shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> thee? and shall the <S%H6697>rock<s%> be <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of his <S%H4480>place?<s%> <S%H4725><s%>
Yea, <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out,<s%> and the <S%H7632>spark<s%> of his <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5050>shine.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> shall be <S%H2821>dark<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and his <S%H5216>candle<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> him.
The <S%H6806>steps<s%> of his <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H3334>straitened,<s%> and his own <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall cast him <S%H7993>down.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he is <S%H7971>cast<s%> into a <S%H7568>net<s%> by his own <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and he <S%H1980>walketh<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H7639>snare.<s%>
The <S%H6341>gin<s%> shall <S%H270>take<s%> him by the <S%H6119>heel,<s%> and the <S%H6782>robber<s%> shall <S%H2388>prevail<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him.
The <S%H2256>snare<s%> is <S%H2934>laid<s%> for him in the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and a <S%H4434>trap<s%> for him <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H5410>way.<s%>
Terrors <S%H1091><s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and shall <S%H6327>drive<s%> him to his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
His <S%H202>strength<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7457>hunger-bitten,<s%> and <S%H343>destruction<s%> shall be <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H6763>side.<s%>
It shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H905>strength<s%> of his <S%H5785>skin:<s%> even the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H905>strength.<s%>
His <S%H4009>confidence<s%> shall be rooted <S%H5423>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H168><s%> and it shall <S%H6805>bring<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1091>terrors.<s%>

It shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> because it is <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H1097><s%> of his: <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall be dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H4480>beneath,<s%> <S%H8478><s%> and <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> shall his <S%H7105>branch<s%> be cut <S%H5243>off.<s%>
His <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and he shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>street.<s%> <S%H2351><s%>
He shall be <S%H1920>driven<s%> from <S%H4480>light<s%> <S%H216><s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H5074>chased<s%> out of the <S%H4480>world.<s%> <S%H8398><s%>
He shall <S%H3808>neither<s%> have <S%H5209>son<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5220>nephew<s%> among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> any <S%H8300>remaining<s%> in his <S%H4033>dwellings.<s%>
They that come <S%H314>after<s%> him shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H3117>day,<s%> as they that went <S%H6931>before<s%> were <S%H8178>frightened.<s%>

Surely <S%H389><s%> <S%H428>such<s%> are the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H5767>wicked,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of him that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
